column3: Sour cream, Mayonnaise, Knorr vegetable mix, Scallions, Spinach, Water chestnuts
column4: In a large bowl, combine sour cream, mayonnaise, water chestnuts, scallions, and Knorr mix. Stir to combine. Stir in spinach, using a spoon or spatula to break up and distribute any clumps of spinach. Cover and chill at least 2 hours or overnight. Serve with bread and fresh vegetables.
